languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, прошу вашего внимания — в топливном отсеке происходят систематические нарушения дисциплины, угрожающие безопасности корабля. Мастер дисциплины игнорирует мои требования, и я вынужден обратиться напрямую к вам!"

"Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, прошу вашего внимания — в топливном отсеке происходят систематические нарушения дисциплины, угрожающие безопасности корабля. Мастер дисциплины игнорирует мои требования, и я вынужден обратиться напрямую к вам!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

"Infernus Master reporting, Lord Captain! May I have your attention, please? There are systematic breaches of discipline in the fuel compartment that jeopardise the safety of the ship. The Master-at-Arms ignores my demands and I am forced to appeal directly to you!"

"Infernus Master reporting, Lord Captain! If I may request your attention for a moment, I must report that there have been a number of systematic breaches of discipline in the fuel compartment that jeopardise the safety of the ship. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

"Infernus Master reporting, Lord Captain! If I may request your attention for a moment, I must report that there have been a number of systematic breaches of discipline in the fuel compartment that jeopardise the safety of the ship. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

"Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

"Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

"Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, si puedo disponer de su atención durante un momento, debo informar de una serie de infracciones de alto riesgo que han tenido lugar en el compartimento de combustible. La maestra de armas ignora mis advertencias, ¡por lo que debo comunicárselo directamente a usted!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Al habla el maestro de infernus, Lord Capitán! Si puedo disponer de su atención durante un momento, debo informar de una serie de infracciones de alto riesgo que han tenido lugar en el compartimento de combustible. La maestra de armas ignora mis advertencias, ¡por lo que debo comunicárselo directamente a usted!».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、もしよろしければ、少しお時間をいただいて、燃料区画で起きた一連の非常に危険な違反についてご報告いたします。マスター・アット・アームが私の要求を無視しているため、閣下に直訴せざるを得なくなったのです！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

traits.locale_text: 「インフェルヌス・マスターが報告します、ロード・キャプテン！少しお時間をいただいて、燃料区画で起きた一連の非常に危険な違反についてご報告いたします。マスター・アット・アームが私の要求を無視しているため、閣下に直訴せざるを得なくなったのです！」

languages.text: “舰长大人，不知能否占用您片刻宝贵时间。我有件事情必须向您报告，燃油舱室发生了极其危险的违规行为。戒律大师不肯理睬我的请求，因此我只能直接向您求助！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

traits.locale_text: “控火大师向您报告，舰长大人！不知能否占用您片刻宝贵时间，我必须向您报告，燃油舱室发生了极其危险的违规行为。戒律大师不肯理睬我的请求，因此我只能直接向您求助！”

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Dürfte ich kurz um Eure Aufmerksamkeit bitten, denn ich muss eine Reihe hochgradig gefährlicher Verfehlungen melden, die sich im Treibstofflager zugetragen haben. Die Waffenmeisterin ignoriert meine Forderungen, weshalb ich gezwungen bin, mich direkt an Euch zu wenden!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

traits.locale_text: "Infernus-Meister mit Bericht, Lord Captain! Dürfte ich kurz um Eure Aufmerksamkeit bitten, denn ich muss eine Reihe hochgradig gefährlicher Verfehlungen melden, die sich im Treibstofflager zugetragen haben. Der Waffenmeister ignoriert meine Forderungen, sodass ich gezwungen bin, mich direkt an Euch zu wenden!"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, si vous pouviez m'accorder quelques instants, j'aurais à vous faire part d'une série de violations gravissimes dans le réservoir de carburant. La capitaine d'armes ignore délibérément mes avertissements, je n'ai donc pas eu d'autre choix que de me présenter directement devant vous ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"

traits.locale_text: « Maître-infernus au rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Si vous pouviez m'accorder quelques instants, j'aurais à vous faire part d'une série de violations gravissimes dans le réservoir de carburant. La capitaine d'armes ignore délibérément mes avertissements, je n'ai donc pas eu d'autre choix que de me présenter directement devant vous ! »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bir dakikanızı ayırmanızı rica edeceğim. Yakıt kompartımanında vuku bulan bir dizi olağanüstü tehlikeli ihlali bildirmem gerekiyor. Silahtar, taleplerimi yok sayıyor. Ben de doğruca size başvurmak zorunda kaldım!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if I may request your attention for a moment, I must report a series of highly dangerous violations that have taken place in the fuel compartment. The Master-at-Arms is ignoring my demands and I am thus forced to appeal directly to you!"
